Text: For The Past Few Weeks I Backed up around 75 of my dvds on blank dvds but just today i started to download a few dvd images ,is there somthing i need to do with them after i burn them i put them in my home dvd player and the movie plays but its in black and white and the screen is rolling up and down ,does anyone know what causes this,any help would be great,maybe im burning wrong,or different region codes,etc dont know
Can your player/tv play NTSC? If they can, did you set them up correctly to do so?
